summary: Implemented a new Publishing/Share page routed at /publishing and linked from the main footer. The page shows the current public URL (window.location.origin), provides a copy-to-clipboard action, and displays toast feedback. However, explicit in-app text stating Google hosting is not supported is not clearly evidenced in the provided diff (page content is truncated and visible sections do not mention Google hosting).

missing_requirements.requirement: The Publishing / Share section contains English text stating that publishing/deployment is to the Internet Computer and that Google hosting is not supported in this project.
missing_requirements.reason: The added page text clearly states hosting on the Internet Computer, but the visible (non-truncated) content does not explicitly say that Google hosting is not supported. The remainder of the file is truncated, so this requirement cannot be verified as implemented from the provided diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: The section displays the current public URL and includes a “Copy link” button.
missing_requirements.reason: The URL is displayed and a copy action exists, but the control appears to be an icon-only button (Copy/Check icons) without the explicit “Copy link” label shown in the diff summary; this may not meet the stated acceptance criteria as written.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution/link to caffeine.ai and the 'Built with ❤️' copy.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest requirements; appears to be newly included as part of the modified footer content.
